Package org.openxava.web.layout

Interface Summary
ILayoutCollectionBeginElement Collection begin marker for collection elements.
ILayoutCollectionEndElement Collection end marker for collection elements.
ILayoutColumnBeginElement Begin marker for layout's column elements.
ILayoutColumnEndElement End marker for column elements.
ILayoutContainerElement  
ILayoutElement Basic layout element
ILayoutFrameBeginElement Begin marker for frame begin element.
ILayoutFrameEndElement End marker for frame elements.
ILayoutGroupBeginElement Begin group element.
ILayoutGroupEndElement End marker for group layout elements.
ILayoutPainter Interface contract for a painter.
ILayoutParser Layout manager interface.
ILayoutPropertyBeginElement Represents a property begin marker element
ILayoutPropertyEndElement End marker for property elements.
ILayoutRowBeginElement Begin marker for row elements.
ILayoutRowEndElement End marker for row elements.
ILayoutSectionsBeginElement Sections begin marker for collection elements.
ILayoutSectionsEndElement Sections end marker for collection elements.
ILayoutSectionsRenderBeginElement Marker for sections rendering elements
ILayoutSectionsRenderEndElement Marker for rendering the sections contents.
ILayoutViewBeginElement  
ILayoutViewEndElement End view marker element.
 

Class Summary
AbstractBasePainter Base class for painters.
AbstractJspPainter Base painter for JSP type painters.
LayoutBaseContainerElement Base Container element
LayoutBaseElement Default implementation for Layout element
LayoutFactory Factory to get instances of layout parsers and layout painter.
LayoutJspKeys  
LayoutKeys  
LayoutPainterManager Painter manager.
 

Enum Summary
LayoutJspUtils Helper for html / jsp rendering.
